item.description:
Hi everyone,

Please join me in Brunswick at the Coastal Humane Society for a Meet-Up focusing on personal disaster preparedness for you and your pet. Think Maine does not have disasters? Think again?remember Hurricane Bob, the ice storm and the recent flooding up in Aroostook County? Maine residents do face disasters and with just a little planning you can help to keep yourselves, your family and your pets safe and provided for. Please join us and learn how!

If you'd like a presentation like this in your neck of the woods, too, please give me a shout!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting in the lobby of the shelter facility for a training on personal disaster preparedness.

group.name: The Maine Animal Welfare Meetup Group

item.name: Brunswick Disaster Preparedness Meet-Up
